item.description:
This is the Granddaddy of them all. The Wild Colonial is a Providence institution and its pub quiz is the stuff of legend. The questions range from local happenings to obscure cartoon characters. Past prizes have included grills, tours, sports tickets and the perennial Wild Colonial pint glasses.

Come on down as we make another showing.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation about the questions or anything else is guaranteed.

Game starts close to 8:00 and runs for about 2 hours!

See you there.


**** Try to get down there before 8:00 so that we can get good tables.

Any winnings will be applied to a future event.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be there with a meetup sign
item.name: Trivia @ The Wild Colonial
